The claim was shared on social media wit: Florida Passes Bill Legalizing Recreational Use of Marijuana."
The bill to legalize marijuana for medic: with lawmakers citing economic benefits and job creation.
The claim included a quote from Democrat: stating that the bill was about legalizing opportunity and prosperity.
The website hosting the article: ABCNews-us.com, was identified as a fake news site designed to trick readers into believing it was affiliated with ABC News. The site has previously published false information and hoaxes.
